Paul M. “PETE” Trest Community/Senior Citizen Center
140 East Chance
Lumberton, Texas 77657
[(409) 755-2230](tel:4097552230)

The Center will be available, to
**City residents only**
, for specific civic or social activities.
.  Renters will have access to the
Decorations are permitted, however, the pictures and other wall decorations currently in place
be removed.  Scheduled events will be approved by the Mayor/City Council, or City Manager.

In addition to rental fee, a City employee must be present during all functions.  The rates, as listed below, are payable by the renter for the city employee:

**There will be no alcoholic beverages or tobacco use permitted on City property**
.

All fees will be due and payable at City Hall at the time of scheduling, and
be scheduled at least two weeks in advance.  In case of an emergency resulting in less than a two week notice, payments MUST be in cash.  In the event of a cancellation, the payment will be refunded
.

In addition, a
deposit will be required to cover any damages.  Upon inspection and approval of the City Manager or his designee, this deposit will be refunded, in full or part, within seven days.
.
